scripts.start-frontend: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run serve --prefix frontend
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run install-frontend && npm run build-frontend
scripts.build-frontend: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
